transArray.content: I booked a family room. My kids loved it. The family of three drank a lot of water. The robot delivered it super quickly. I like it.

Dear guest, thank you for choosing Hanting! The hotel is the new version of Hanting 2.7, with novel decoration and complete facilities. During the epidemic, the hotel strictly followed the epidemic prevention requirements and strictly disinfected and cleaned every room and corner of the hotel. We also have dedicated personnel to clean and disinfect the hotel every day. Each room is strictly inspected before it can be sold, so that every traveler can stay with confidence. The hotel also has a free laundry room and dryer, which is very convenient. We look forward to your visit again. I wish you a happy life!
